title: Summoner icon from season 3 is missing, what can I do?

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: I don't know if I should contact riot or if it was supposed to disappear. What can I do? If you look at the gif you can see that there is no bronze summoner icon. I know it's not a big deal but I like to see my progress. Please help if you can.

replies.body:
Hey Elf,

After looking into this account, it seems that you did not qualify for the Season 3 bronze icon as you did not play enough games. If you don't think that's the case, you should [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can further look into this issue!

Thank you for that, i will check into it because I definitely remember getting that icon, I still don't hear the end of it from my friends, I will see if I can find any screenshots and send them in. Thanks for your time
